S1MonoDir.description: The path to the Schedule I Mono location. This is used to set up the project references.

S1IL2CPPDir.description: The path to the Schedule I IL2CPP location. This is used to set up the project references.

CommonDir.description: Path to Common location. This could be used to store commonly used mods in one place.

UnityExplorerMono.description: Path to UnityExplorer Mod Location for Mono. UnityExplorer is a mod that helps you debug GameObjects and their components.

UnityExplorerIL2CPP.description: Path to UnityExplorer Mod Location for IL2CPP. UnityExplorer is a mod that helps you debug GameObjects and their components.

MultiplayerMod.description: Path to Multiplayer Mod Location. This mod allows you to test your mods in local multiplayer.

MultiplayerModStarter.description: Path to Multiplayer Mod Starter Location. This is a batch file that starts the game in two windows - server and client.
